Milica first performed the play five
years ago soon after the December 2012

and the gang rape of a photojournalist
in Mumbai a few months later there was
quite understandably massive outrage
over the incidents sex and sex crimes
have long been a taboo in our society so
when sex attacks and rapes become topics

extremely uncomfortable and shocked at
